headline: Ask HN: G.E.C.K. but for the web?
description:
There is a popular sentiment of escaping walled gardens of Facebook and others. How do you do it?

I want to start a small community with a blog and forum. Preferably the forum would also power blog comments.

Right now I'm leaning towards Ghost+Discourse[1]. But I'm already running into some issues like not being able to localize Ghost, especially search and subscription functions.

Do you have a favourite solution here? A sort of G.E.C.K. but for the web?

[1] https://ghost.org/integrations/discourse/
description_zh-Hans:
现在有一种流行的情绪，即逃离Facebook和其他的围墙花园。你是如何做到的？

我想建立一个有博客和论坛的小型社区。

现在我倾向于使用Ghost+Discourse[1]。但是我已经遇到了一些问题，比如不能对Ghost进行本地化，特别是搜索和订阅功能。

你在这里有什么喜欢的解决方案吗？一种G.E.C.K.但用于网络的方案？

[1] https://ghost.org/integrations/discourse/

你在這裡有什麼喜歡的解決方案嗎？一種G.E.C.K.但用於網絡的方案？
